Effective Date: 07 May 2025

Welcome to Taskly Tools! These Terms and Conditions govern your access to and use of our website and services located at https://tasklytools.org. When you use any of our tools, you are confirming that you understand and accept the rules and guidelines we’ve shared on this website.

If you’re not comfortable with any of our rules, it’s best not to use our website or tools.

Slogan: All-in-One Free Tools — Use It, Get Results, We Store Nothing.

1. Overview

Taskly Tools is a free online platform that offers a variety of web-based tools for productivity, development, SEO, and more. All tools are available to the public free of charge. We do not require registration, and we do not collect or store any user-uploaded data.

2. Acceptance of Terms

When you access or use any tool on Taskly Tools, you’re agreeing to follow our Terms and Conditions along with our Privacy Policy.

3. Use of Our Tools

You’re welcome to use any of our tools for the following purposes:

  • Personal use
  • Academic use
  • Business or professional use (non-commercial exploitation)

However, by using our site, you agree:

  • Not to misuse the tools in any way that could harm the platform or other users.
  • Not to upload illegal, harmful, or copyrighted content to be processed by our tools.
  • Not to use automated bots or scripts to overload or scrape our content.

All tools are provided “as-is” with no guarantees of uninterrupted access or error-free performance.

4. Intellectual Property

Unless otherwise stated:

  • All content, design, branding, and tools on Taskly Tools are the intellectual property of Taskly Tools.
  • Users may not copy, reproduce, sell, or distribute any part of our platform without prior written permission.

You retain full rights to any content you upload and process using our tools — we do not claim ownership over user-generated content.

All product names, logos, and brands used in affiliate content remain the property of their respective owners and are used only for identification purposes. Their use does not imply endorsement by Taskly Tools.

5. Data Privacy & Security

Your privacy is our priority. As stated in our Privacy Policy:

  • We do not collect or store any personal data or files that users upload to our tools.
  • All processing happens in real-time and data is immediately discarded after use.

We earn revenue through both Google AdSense and affiliate marketing programs such as the Amazon Associates Program. This means we may include affiliate links on our site, and we may earn a commission when users click and purchase from those links. For more details, please see our Privacy Policy and Disclaimer.

6. Advertisements

Our site is monetized through Google AdSense. Ads displayed are managed by Google and may be based on your online activity. We are not responsible for the content or offers shown in ads.

Please refer to Google’s Advertising Policies for more details.

7. Limitation of Liability

As allowed by law, Taskly Tools is not responsible for the following situations:

  • Any type of loss or damage—whether direct, indirect, unexpected, or resulting from your use of our website or tools.
  • Data loss, business interruption, or system failure.
  • Reliance on any results or output generated by our tools.

Use our tools at your own discretion and responsibility.

8. External Links

Our website may include links to third-party sites, tools, or resources. We don’t control the content, reliability, or availability of other websites we link to. If you choose to visit them, you do so at your own risk.

9. Modifications to Terms

We can change or update these Terms & Conditions whenever needed, without giving advance notice. Any updates will appear on this page along with the new effective date. Continued use of our website means you accept the revised terms.

10. Termination of Use

We reserve the right to block, suspend, or terminate access to our website without notice if a user is found to be violating these terms or engaging in harmful activity.

11. Governing Law

These Terms & Conditions are governed by and interpreted in accordance with international internet standards and applicable digital service regulations.

12. Affiliate Disclosure

Taskly Tools is a participant in various affiliate marketing programs, including the Amazon Services LLC Associates Program, an affiliate advertising program designed to provide a means for sites to earn advertising fees by advertising and linking to products on Amazon.com or other affiliated websites.

This means some links on our site may be “affiliate links,” where we may earn a small commission if you click through and make a purchase—at no extra cost to you.

We only recommend products or services that we believe will add value to our users. However, we do not guarantee any product’s performance or service level, and we advise users to do their own research before making a purchase.

13. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, feel free to contact us:

  • Email: tasklytools@gmail.com
  • Website: https://tasklytools.org

Thank you for using Taskly Tools — your go-to platform for All-in-One Free Tools!
